Path: Both Query and FwkLinkedServiceId are not specified
Both Query and FwkLinkedServiceId are specified

Query: Query with both Path and Entity
Params can't be specified when exporting to Database

Path: Params can't be specified when exporting from existing files

Query: Query with both Path and Entity
PreCopyScript: PreCopyScript can't be specified when exporting files
PreCopyScript can't be specified when exporting from existing files

Path: SourcePath is mandatory when exporting from existing files

SourcePath: Path is mandatory when exporting from existing files
